CHAT.comment: DOUG WADDINGTON, SUPERINTENDENT, WASHINGTON CORRECTIONS CENTER, Petitioner v. CESAR SARAUSAD.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM B. COLLINS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY FISHER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM B. COLLINS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above entitled matter was submitted.)
